issue.title: Row_groups duplicate Rows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6129](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6129). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Using Row_Groups to write Parquet, duplicate rows:

    Input: CSV 10 Rows

    Row_Groups=1 --> Output 10 Rows 

    Row_Groups=2 --> Output 20 Rows

  ![tes_output.png](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12976647/tes_output.png)

Is this the expected?
attached code snippet and CSV

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6129?focusedCommentId=16900751) by albertoramon (albertoramon):*
This is the expected behavior
